title: Super Bowl predictions 2026: Bears fans pick Seahawks vs. Patriots winner

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Super Bowl predictions 2026: Bears fans pick Seahawks vs. Patriots winner
sources.description: Chicago Bears fans have spoken! Like most NFL fans, we believe the Seattle Seahawks will win the Super Bowl over the New England Patriots, although a higher percentage of us (92%) have the ‘Hawks winning than the national results (82%). In fact, every fanbase but one has a majority of their fans picking the Seahawks, […]
